affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Allies
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, tethered units target gain 1.5x the amount. Any enemy unit that crosses the tether is slowed. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.
notes:
If you try to tether a unit that is 700 distance or further away from Io, he will latch on and pull himself closer to the tethered unit (to a distance of 300).
The tethered unit will heal 50% faster.
attrib:
MAX TETHER DISTANCE: 900/900/900/900
MOVEMENT SPEED BONUS: 17%
TETHER DURATION: 12/12/12/12
ENEMY MOVEMENT SLOW: 100%
ENEMY ATTACK SLOW: 100
ENEMY SLOW DURATION: 0.75/1.25/1.75/2.25
cmb:
40/40/40/40
12
lore: The benevolent touch of Io brings strength from between the planes.
name: wisp_tether

desc: Break the link to the tethered unit.
cmb: 1
name: wisp_tether_break

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode.  When its duration ends, any remaining Spirits explode.
attrib:
CREEP DAMAGE: 8/14/20/26
HERO DAMAGE: 25/50/75/100
OSCILLATION RADIUS: 875/875/875/875
EXPLOSION RADIUS: 300/300/300/300
DURATION: 19/19/19/19
cmb:
120/130/140/150
20/18/16/14
lore: Io twists the particles of the universe with its unimaginable capabilities.
name: wisp_spirits

desc: Io gains bonus attack speed and damage reduction, at the cost of draining a percentage of its current health and mana per second.  If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.
notes: Io's tethered unit will also benefit from the attack speed and reduction, but only Io pays the drain in HP and mana.
cmb: 2
lore: Drawing on the energy of matter from all worlds, Io begins the unravelling of time.
name: wisp_overcharge

desc: Teleports Io and any tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires Io and any tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
notes:
Enemies receive a visual indicator in the world and on the minimap of the target location during the cast delay.
If Io is disabled during the cast delay, Relocate is cancelled.
If an allied hero is Tethered, that hero will teleported along with you. You can break the tether at any time to prevent that hero from teleporting with you.
cmb:
100/100/100
90/75/60
lore: Io is the embodiment of the mystery of the universe.
name: wisp_relocate

desc: Calls the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off.
name: wisp_spirits_in

desc: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off.
name: wisp_spirits_out
